org.solenopsis.keraiai.soap.exception

Class ExceptionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.solenopsis.keraiai.soap.exception.ExceptionContext

  • public class ExceptionContext
extends Object
    Context for managing the type of exceptions caught when calling SFDC web services via a proxy port.
    Author:
    Scot P. Floess

      • computeTotals

        public String computeTotals(boolean isZeroIncluded)
        Compute our totals. If isZeroIncluded will include all totals. Otherwise totals of zero are excluded.
        Parameters:
        isZeroIncluded - flag, if true denotes all zero totals are included.
        Returns:
        a String of the totals.
